runner module

runner.run_simulation(user_node_path, duration=15)[source]

Launches Gazebo and the user’s ROS2 node in a headless environment.

  1. Starts Xvfb (Virtual Monitor).

  2. Launches Gazebo.

  3. Runs the user’s Python script.

  4. Cleans up processes after the duration ends.

Parameters:

  • user_node_path – Path to the python script to run.

  • duration – How long (in seconds) to run the simulation.
